row.name: PCK.AUTOMIC_CLOUDFOUNDRY.PRV.JOB.CREATE_SERVICE@GENERIC
row.description: Create service instance in Cloud Foundry

row.process:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CLOUDFOUNDRY.PUB.INCLUDE.EXECUTION_ENVIRONMENT !------------------------------------------ LOGGING INPUT PARAMETERS ------------------------------------------ : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Authentication Token" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_CF_AUTHTOKEN#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Service name" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_CF_SERVICE_NAME#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Service" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_CF_SERVICE#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Plan" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_CF_SERVICE_PLAN#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Tags" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_CF_SERVICE_TAGS#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
:INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION
!------------------------------------------ PREPARE AUTH DETAILS ---------------------------------------------- :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CLOUDFOUNDRY.PUB.INCLUDE.PREP_AUTHINFO
:IF &UC4RB_CF_RETCODE# = 0 ! -------------------------------------Building input parameters----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : SET &UC4RB_CF_CREATE_SERVICE_CLA# ="cf create-service "
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CLOUDFOUNDRY.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_CF_SERVICE# : SET &UC4RB_CF_CREATE_SERVICE_CLA# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CF_CREATE_SERVICE_CLA#, "&UC4RB_CF_SERVICE# ")
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CLOUDFOUNDRY.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_CF_SERVICE_PLAN# : SET &UC4RB_CF_CREATE_SERVICE_CLA# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CF_CREATE_SERVICE_CLA#, "&UC4RB_CF_SERVICE_PLAN# ")
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CLOUDFOUNDRY.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_CF_SERVICE_NAME# : SET &UC4RB_CF_CREATE_SERVICE_CLA# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CF_CREATE_SERVICE_CLA#, "&UC4RB_CF_SERVICE_NAME# ")
!-Add flag -t if tag/s provided :IF &UC4RB_CF_SERVICE_TAGS# <> '' : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CLOUDFOUNDRY.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_CF_SERVICE_TAGS# : SET &UC4RB_CF_CREATE_SERVICE_CLA# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CF_CREATE_SERVICE_CLA#, " -t &UC4RB_CF_SERVICE_TAGS#") :ENDIF
!--- Add flag -c if config is provided :IF &UC4RB_CF_SERVICE_CONFIG# <> ''
!--- Create temporary file for contents : SET &UC4RB_CF_FILECONTENTS# = &UC4RB_CF_SERVICE_CONFIG# : SET &UC4RB_CF_TMP_CONFIGFILE# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CF_HOMEDIR#,&SEPARATOR#) : SET &UC4RB_CF_TMP_CONFIGFILE# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CF_TMP_CONFIGFILE#,"tmpconfig.json") : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CLOUDFOUNDRY.PUB.INCLUDE.CREATE_FILE &UC4RB_CF_CONFIGFILE# = &UC4RB_CF_TMP_CONFIGFILE# : IF &UC4RB_CF_RETCODE# <> 0 : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Unable to create temporary file for provided config param at location &UC4RB_CF_TMP_CONFIGFILE#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR : ELSE : SET &UC4RB_CF_TMP_CONFIGFILE# = STR_CAT( '"',&UC4RB_CF_TMP_CONFIGFILE#) : SET &UC4RB_CF_TMP_CONFIGFILE# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CF_TMP_CONFIGFILE#,'"') : SET &UC4RB_CF_CREATE_SERVICE_CLA# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CF_CREATE_SERVICE_CLA#, " -c &UC4RB_CF_TMP_CONFIGFILE#") : ENDIF
:ENDIF
!------------------------ LOGGING CF COMMAND :IF &UC4RB_CF_RETCODE# = 0 :PRINT "EXECUTING CF CREATE_SERVICE COMMAND: &UC4RB_CF_CREATE_SERVICE_CLA#" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = STR_CAT( "EXECUTING CF CREATE_SERVICE COMMAND: ", &UC4RB_CF_CREATE_SERVICE_CLA#) :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO !------------------------------------------ INVOKING CF COMMAND LINE ------------------------------------------ &UC4RB_CF_CREATE_SERVICE_CLA# :ENDIF :ENDIF
!Status messages :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** CREATE SERVICE ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** CREATE SERVICE ACTION FAILED ********"
!------------------------------------------ ERROR HANDLING ---------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CLOUDFOUNDRY.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS

row.post_process: !------------------------------------------ UPDATE AUTH INFO INTO VARA OBJECT ------------------------------------------ : SET &STATUS# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(,,"RETCODE") : IF &STATUS# EQ 0 : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CLOUDFOUNDRY.PUB.INCLUDE.UPDATE_AUTHINFO : ENDIF
